body_html: That's a reasonable change, and we can merge it. Please replicate it in tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/layers and in the repo keras-team/keras/ as well. Please also add a unit test for the behavior you are trying to achieve.

body: That's a reasonable change, and we can merge it. Please replicate it in `tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/layers` and in the repo `keras-team/keras/` as well. Please also add a unit test for the behavior you are trying to achieve.
